about_the_game:
Welcome to the World of Madora, a mythological land with Brazilian inspirations, where Good tries to contain the advance of evil and guarantee peace. Adventure through volcanoes, mountains, forests, seas and other inspiring landscapes to elevate your roguelite experience.

Transform into an elf warlock with giant claws, or a mystical assassin genius, or whatever other character combinations you can think of. In Madora you will be challenged to create the most incredible character possible to defeat evil and free the tribes from Árodam's rule.

Orders of goblins, giant serpents, heroes who have converted to the dark side...here you will face different types of enemies and you will have to raise your skills to the extreme to stop them all and the advance of the shadows. Defeat them and convert them to the light side, being able to restart and start your adventures playing with them, having more and more options and combinations for victory.

short_description: Explore the challenges of this roguelite set in the mythological world of Madora, assemble the best combination of skills, classes and characters to defeat evil and unleash even greater powers in this action and strategy game.
